#summary How to set up MotionInJoy in order to work with the framework.

= Istructions =

 * Download the 7.0 version from here: [http://www.motioninjoy.com/download]
 * Install MotionInJoy, but don't load the drivers yet!
 * Download this file: [http://moveframework.googlecode.com/svn/wiki/0.7.0003_a.zip]
 * Unzip and replace the MijXfilt.sys (C:\Program Files\MotioninJoy\ds3\drivers)
 * Now load the drivers
 * Enjoy

== This version of the MIJ driver is not officially released and may not be stable. Use it for your own risk or wait for the official version! ==
